about_the_game:
Enjoy all the soundtrack you can hear in Victorian Debutante! Got hooked on one of the loops? Loop it up and feast upon that husky little records. Originally composed by all those long-dead big composers, they are now brought back to life by very much alive, and talented, Kacper "Stridmon" Garbacz.

Please note that this soundtrack DLC is an additional content and does not include the base game.
detailed_description:
Enjoy all the soundtrack you can hear in Victorian Debutante! Got hooked on one of the loops? Loop it up and feast upon that husky little records. Originally composed by all those long-dead big composers, they are now brought back to life by very much alive, and talented, Kacper "Stridmon" Garbacz.

Please note that this soundtrack DLC is an additional content and does not include the base game.
name: Victorian Debutante Soundtrack
short_description: Immerse yourself into the world of Victorian Debutante even when you're not playing the game! Listen to the soundtrack, choose your favourite loops or surprise yourself with randomising tracks. Basically, enjoy!
